TO; John Holt, Waldo Abbot |
John Regnell, Hugh Mix
FROM; Jim Slack
SUBJECT; Messages and Men
British Students View U.S. Education
Not entirely pleased with series "Messages and Men”. However,
i found it laudable and generally seems to hit the mark. I
thought some of the material inane and simplified. None the
less I vote "yes".
"British Students View U. S. Education". Can’t tell whether
this is a short or an entire program series. Am frankly getting
just a little bit weary of the views of foreigners on American
education etal. My fierce provincialism reveals itself under
the needling of foreign students who claim post-graduate
abilities at the age of IJ4. Thinking in terms of the entire
network, I will suppress my personal feelings and vote "yes”.
In other respects I think the program is quite well done.
